Sentencas: Three different cathode materials for CO2 reduction by high temperature solid oxide electrolysis cell were employed and compared in different CO2/CO atmospheres.
Titulo: Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: The I-V curves showed distinct non-linear behavior in humidified 5% H-2/Ar atmospheres and closer to linear responses in CO2/CO atmospheres.
Titulo: Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: Different impedance responses were found on these cathodes for CO2 electrolysis, suggesting different rate-limiting processes occurred.
Titulo: Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance, Rp, of Ni/YSZ cathode first reduced and then increased with increasing CO concentration, possibly because of coke formation at high CO content, which was not observed on LSCM based cathodes.
Titulo: Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: Compared to the LSCM/YSZ cathode, the LSCM/GDC cathode had larger Rp at OCV but lower Rp under load probably due to the reduction of GDC which enhanced the cathode activity.
Titulo: Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: The LSCM/GDC cathode also showed good durability in CO2 electrolysis operation, indicating a promising alternative cathode for CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells
Alternative Cathode Material for CO2 Reduction by High Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells
